comment: Sample DIH Service adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.DigitalInnovationHub/master/DigitalInnovationHubService/schema.json
description: Provision of insights and trend on markets to companies to stimulate their internal innovation.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: author
contents.comment: Author of the Digital Innovation Hub Service

contents.name: category
contents.comment: Category of the Digital Innovation Hub Service

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateSubmitted
contents.comment: The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format

contents.name: dateUpdated
contents.comment: The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: serviceImage
contents.comment: URL of the image of the Digital Innovation Hub Service

contents.name: serviceSubType
contents.comment: ServiceSubType of the Digital Innovation Hub Service

contents.name: serviceType
contents.comment: ServiceType of the Digital Innovation Hub Service

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: url
contents.comment: URL of the Digital Innovation Hub Service

contents.name: additionalMaterial
contents.comment: Additional Materials of the Digital Innovation Hub

contents.name: contacts
contents.comment: Contacts of the Digital Innovation Hub

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: relation
contents.comment: Relations of the Digital Innovation Hub Service

contents.name: target
contents.comment: Targets of the Digital Innovation Hub Service

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
